summary: The Tuches' youngest son, Donald, goes to the United States to study. The rest of the family decides to pay him a surprise visit for his birthday but things do not go the way they planned...
cast: Jean-Paul Rouve|Isabelle Nanty|Claire Nadeau|Sarah Stern|Pierre Lottin|Théo Fernandez|Ken Samuels|Susan Almgren|Katherine Adams|Ralph Amoussou|Elizabeth Anne|Kseniya Babayeva|Sabrina Baribeau|Olivier Baroux|Maurice Barthélémy|Nancy Bouchard|Chloe Carabasi|Jassen Charron|Circus-Szalewski|Vincent D'Arbouze|Christian de la Cortina|Darrell Dennis|David A. Garcia|Jordan Lee|Elodie Lehue|Maxime-Diego Lehue|Jeremy A. Lopez|Joleen Lutz|Joey Mac Intosh|Louis Macarthur|Royal Martin|Mina Merad|Trevor Momesso|Alice Morel-Michaud|Melvin Payne Jr.|Melissa Plante|Lionel Reynaud|Richard Robitaille|Leigh Ann Taylor|Luz Tercero|Shoshana Wilder|Steve Barry
title: Les Tuche 2 - Le rêve américain
